# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value for those seeking excellence in its category. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I propose a special introductory offer of $100 for you to experience it firsthand. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, so don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
